A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really loved this movie! It featured great performances from everyone involved and the cinematography\, score and writing were on par with the Original Trilogy and it had the heart and weight. People complain about Snoke's lack of backstory but in Return of the Jedi\, the Emperor didn't get a backstory and no one lost their minds then. Ignore the Audience Score\, this is a great movie and I look forward to happened next a long time ago in a galaxy far\, far away!
